title: I Can’t Stop Myself!
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>This is my first time having such thick pancakes~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Fufu, aren’t you surprised~? When Nozomi first brought me here, I was pretty surprised too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Nozomi told you about this café?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yup. Melon soda and pancakes are a perfect combination~! Here, let me pour the maple syrup~......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Kyaah! It looks delicious~! Don’t mind if I do! Nom......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>What do you think, Yoshiko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>This is amazing...... Also, it’s Yohane. Hanayo, you should dig in too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Alright, don’t mind if I do! Nom...... mmm, delicious....... This is the best...... The way the butter melts onto the thick pancakes and blends with the maple syrup~......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I was wondering if I could finish all of these thick pancakes, but now I think it’s perfectly portioned.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>You could gobble it all up in no time~! I wonder if I should order a hot sandwich as well~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
